description.0: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

0.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <cryo>100%</cryo> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

1.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <cryo>125%</cryo> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

2.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <cryo>150%</cryo> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

3.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <cryo>175%</cryo> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

4.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <cryo>200%</cryo> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
